thread.title: BRIEF-Shanghai Kelai Mechatronics Signs Sales Contract With Bosch's Auto Parts Firm

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shanghai Kelai Mechatronics Signs Sales Contract With Bosch's Auto Parts Firm

organizations.name: brief-shanghai kelai mechatronics signs sales contract with bosch
shanghai kelai mechatronics engineering co ltd

text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Shanghai Kelai Mechatronics Engineering Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT SIGNS SALES CONTRACT WORTH 43.5 MILLION YUAN ($6.87 million) WITH BOSCH'S AUTO PARTS FIRM Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2BV0iDN Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3282 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
